body: Normal metamagic rods can be used with spells of 6th level or lower. Lesser rods can be used with spells of 3rd level or lower, while greater rods can be used with spells of 9th level or lower.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Rods/Metamagic Rods/Lesser and Greater Metamagic Rods
name: Lesser and Greater Metamagic Rods
